heading: HR02386
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO IMMEDIATELY CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REPORTED SELLING OF AFP-OWNED FIREARMS AND AMMUNITIONS TO TERRORISTS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF FILING APPROPRIATE MEASURES TO PREVENT THIS CHRONIC INCIDENT FROM RECURRING IN THE FUTURE
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-01-15
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02386
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO IMMEDIATELY CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REPORTED SELLING OF AFP-OWNED FIREARMS AND AMMUNITIONS TO TERRORISTS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF FILING APPROPRIATE MEASURES TO PREVENT THIS CHRONIC INCIDENT FROM RECURRING IN THE FUTURE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-12-20
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
